productHeader.productDesc: ACCOLADE and ESSENTIO are Boston Scientific’s most advanced Pacemakers offering the assurance of Automatic Daily Monitoring to improve patient compliance, actionable data to enable earlier intervention, and the longest projected longevity in the industry* *Model L321 ACCOLADE EL and Model L121 ESSENTIO EL devices
productHeader.title: ACCOLADE™ and ESSENTIO™

text.text:
Clinical Benefits for You and Your Patients.

Automatic Daily Monitoring

ACCOLADE and ESSENTIO feature Automatic Daily Monitoring with the LATITUDE™ NXT Patient Management System to improve clinic efficiency and provide a higher level of care for your device patients. With LATITUDE NXT, these systems provide automatic and customizable alerts and device interrogation with no interaction from the patient enabling earlier arrhythmia detection and improved patient compliance.

Actionable Data

The ACCOLADE System provides improved access to actionable data that enables earlier intervention:

The new Atrial Arrhythmia Report is now available with ACCOLADE Pacemakers, providing a comprehensive view of your patient’s AT/AF status and information for assessing AF treatment efficacy.

ACCOLADE Pacemakers carry forward the HF PERSPECTIV™ System, a comprehensive suite of diagnostics that can provide insight into HF disease progression including Respiratory Rate Trend (RRT) which allows you to measure and track your patient’s respiration; Heart Rate Variability (HRV) footprint; SDANN; Autonomic Balance Monitor and heart rate trend showing long-term maximum, minimum and average heart rate.

Leader in Longevity

ACCOLADE and ESSENTIO Extended Life (EL) batteries provide the industry’s greatest pacemaker battery capacity at 1.6 Amp hours and the longest projected longevity at 12.1 years.
